channel.title: CVE Feed for SAP_SE -- SAP Commerce Cloud
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SAP_SE -- SAP Commerce Cloud

item.title: CVE-2023-42481|2024-08-02T19:23:39.286Z -- sap_se -- sap%20commerce%20cloud
item.description: In SAP Commerce Cloud - versions HY_COM 1905, HY_COM 2005, HY_COM2105, HY_COM 2011, HY_COM 2205, COM_CLOUD 2211, a locked B2B user can misuse the forgotten password functionality to un-block his user account again and re-gain access if SAP Commerce Cloud - Composable Storefront is used as storefront, due to weak access controls in place. This leads to a considerable impact on confidentiality and integrity.
